fi.make.brimstone.game.mapobjects

Class MapObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.make.brimstone.game.mapobjects.MapObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Flame, Level, NCU, Player

    public abstract class MapObject
extends Object
    Abstract class template for drawable objects on the map. MapObjects need to have a location on the map and an Image.
    Author:
    make
